item.title: Created a new rank
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You forgot to extend the sprites being loaded, or how many there are

so change this:
for(int i = 0; i <= 6; i++){
modIcons[i] = new Sprite(“Player/MODICONS “+i+””);
}

to 8 I believe. (if it still fails, make it 9 or 7)

Do the same with chatIcons, if you have them.

for(int i = 0; i <= 6; i++){
chatIcons[i] = new Sprite(“Player/MODICONS “+i+””);
}
^looks like that…

And then change these in the client() method:
modIcons = new Sprite[7];
chatImages = new Sprite[7];
To how ever many icons you have, + 1.
So if you have MODICONS 0-10, you’d make it new Sprite[11];

Read full topic
